item.title: ‘The Twisted Tale of Amanda Knox’ Review: Hulu Miniseries Is a Savvy, Compelling Take on True Crime
item.description: Grace Van Patten stars as the American student infamously and falsely accused of murdering her roommate, in a drama executive produced by Monica Lewinsky and Knox herself.
